system.description: This spell enables you or a creature you touch to move and attack normally for the duration, even under the influence of magic that usually impedes movement (paralysis, solid fog, slow, web). The subject automatically succeeds on any grapple check made to resist a grapple attempt, and on checks to escape a grapple or pin. The subject can move and attack normally while underwater with slashing or bludgeoning weapons wielded in hand.

components.materialDescription: A leather thong, bound around the arm or a similar appendage.
